description: This file configures the Angular application by setting up providers including zone change detection, router, and client hydration.

methods.name: provideZoneChangeDetection
methods.description: Configures Angular's zone change detection with event coalescing enabled.

methods.name: provideRouter
methods.description: Provides routing configuration for the Angular application using specified routes.

methods.name: provideClientHydration
methods.description: Enables client-side hydration with event replay functionality.

methods.name: withEventReplay
methods.description: Configures event replay options for hydration.
